max-advertising-reports.help: Maximum number of pending legacy or extended advertising reports.

default-extended-advertising-fragmentati.help: Default extended advertising data fragmentation size.

extended-advertising-size.help: Maximum extended advertising data (and scan data response) size, Minimum value is 251

handle-vendor-specific-hci-commands.help: Handle VS HCI commands. Valid values are 0 (ignore) and 1 (handle).

uart-hci.help: Does the board have a UART HCI. Valid values are 0 and 1 (must provide UART through PAL).

custom-hci-transport.help: This enables transport through port provided functions, do not disable unless you wish you use uart-hci.
